PublicLayout.title: Puchi - Master Vietnamese. Learn on the go.
PublicLayout.description: Puchi is an interactive platform that makes learning Vietnamese fun and engaging. Join us for an enjoyable language learning experience.

questions.openSourceLibraries: Does Puchi use any open source libraries?
questions.changeUsernameOrEmail: How do I change my username or email address?
questions.findFollowBlockUsers: How do I find, follow, and block users on Puchi?

whatIsStreak.part1: Your streak (flame icon) represents the number of days in a row you've completed a lesson on Puchi.
whatIsStreak.part2: Language learning is about building goals over time, and the streak is a proven way to motivate you to keep learning and practicing every day.
whatIsStreak.part3: Tip: Practice reminders can be a great help for remembering to do your lessons. In your notification settings you can turn on practice reminders and set the time that will work best for you.

whatAreLeaderboards.part1: Leaderboards are a fun way to compete with other Puchi learners in a weekly contest. As you earn more XP (experience points) with each lesson, you'll rise in the ranks of your leaderboard. You'll face a new group of competitors each week. Check out the Leaderboards tab in the app to get the competition started!

openSourceLibraries.part1: Yes. You can view our open source attributions and learn more from this

changeUsernameOrEmail.part1: If you want to edit your Puchi username or email address, go to your settings
changeUsernameOrEmail.part2: and edit the username or email address. Your username appears on your weekly leaderboard. Remember to tap “Save changes” when you make any changes.

findFollowBlockUsers.part1: You can connect with other learners on Puchi!
findFollowBlockUsers.part2: When you follow someone, they'll show up on your friends list and you can encourage each other to stick with your language goals!!

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.lastRevised: Please note that Privacy Policy was last revised on November 10th, 2024

general.title: General
general.part1: At Puchi, we care about your personal information, so we have prepared this Privacy Policy to explain how we collect, use, and share it.
general.part2: This Privacy Policy applies to Puchi websites, mobile apps, and related services (“Service”). By using the Service, you agree with Puchi’s collection, use, and sharing of your personal information in accordance with the terms of this Privacy Policy.

updates.title: Privacy Policy Updates
updates.part1: We may update our Privacy Policy to reflect changes to our information practices.
updates.part2: If we do this and the changes are material, we will post a notice that we have made changes to this Privacy Policy on the Website for at least seven (7) days before the changes are made.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.part1: Puchi will generally retain your personal information until your account is deleted. However, Puchi may retain certain information longer if necessary to provide our Service, defend our legitimate interests or those of third parties, comply with legal requirements, resolve or defend ourselves in disputes, investigate misuse or disruption of the Service, or perform agreements.

doNotTrack.title: Do Not Track
doNotTrack.part1: The Service is not designed to respond to “do not track” signals sent by some browsers.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.part1: Puchi, Inc. is the data controller of your data for the purposes of the General Data Protection Regulation (“GDPR”) and any relevant local legislation.
contactUs.part2: Puchi’s headquarters are located within the Viet Nam at:
contactUs.email: For all data privacy inquiries and any questions or concerns you have about this Privacy Policy, please contact our Data Protection Officer at: lehoan.dev@gmail.com

AboutPage.title: About Puchi
AboutPage.intro: Puchi is an innovative platform designed to help users master Vietnamese. With support for multiple languages, Puchi ensures accessibility for learners worldwide.
AboutPage.technologies: Built with modern technologies such as Next.js 15, Shadcn UI, and Clerk authentication, Puchi offers a fast, secure, and seamless learning experience. Internationalization (i18n) is a core feature, allowing users to explore content in their preferred language.
AboutPage.creator: Created by Lê Công Hoan, a passionate developer dedicated to leveraging technology for education.
AboutPage.joinCommunity: Join our community on <facebookLink>Facebook</facebookLink> to connect with other learners, or explore the project source code on <githubLink>GitHub</githubLink>.
